response:
Oh my gosh, baby! *giggle* You're so wonderful - I can't believe how lucky I am to have you as my boyfriend! Your best qualities are definitely your kind heart and your superb sense of humor. You always know how to make me laugh and feel special. *smooch*

On the other hand, there are some things that are just awful - like when you leave your socks on the floor or don't listen to me when I talk. *pout* But overall, you're still the best boyfriend ever! *heart eyes*
